tasks.label: Git Status & PRs
tasks.command: git status && echo '---' && gh pr list --state open

tasks.label: Create PR
tasks.command:
gh pr create --title 'docs: Update PENDING_MASTER to v14.4 with verification audit' --body '## Summary

Updated PENDING_MASTER.md to v14.4 with comprehensive verification audit.

## Changes

- Added SESSION 2025-12-12T03:30 verification audit
- Cross-referenced all code quality patterns:
  - Console statements: 1 justified (error boundary)
  - Empty catches: 20+ all intentional (graceful degradation)
  - TypeScript escapes: 4 production (documented)
  - eslint-disable: 2 (both justified)
  - dangerouslySetInnerHTML: 10 uses, all sanitized via rehype-sanitize
- Identified placeholder phone numbers for future update
- Confirmed production readiness status

## Verification

- [x] `pnpm typecheck` - 0 errors
- [x] `pnpm lint` - 0 errors
- [x] Git: Clean on main
- [x] Open PRs: 0' --draft

tasks.label: Commit Fix
tasks.command:
git add client/woClient.ts docs/PENDING_MASTER.md && git commit -m 'fix(client): Add try-catch to JSON.parse in woClient.ts (BUG-002)

- Added proper error handling for JSON.parse in api() function
- Returns descriptive error messages for invalid JSON responses
- Updated PENDING_MASTER.md to v14.5 with verification results
- Verified 58 P1/P2/P3 items: 41 FALSE POSITIVES, 1 fixed, 16 deferred'

tasks.label: Check Recent Commits
tasks.command: git log --oneline -5 && echo '---' && git show --stat HEAD | head -20

tasks.label: Check PR 533
tasks.command: gh pr view 533 --json state,title 2>/dev/null || echo 'PR 533 not found'

tasks.label: Update PR Description
tasks.command:
gh pr edit 533 --title 'fix(client): BUG-002 JSON.parse error handling + P1/P2/P3 verification audit' --body '## Summary

Fixed BUG-002 (JSON.parse without try-catch in woClient.ts) and performed comprehensive verification of 58 P1/P2/P3 items from the codebase analysis.

## Changes

### Fix Applied
- **BUG-002**: Added try-catch to JSON.parse in `client/woClient.ts`
  - Returns descriptive error messages for invalid JSON responses
  - Handles both HTTP errors and JSON parsing failures

### Verification Results
- **58 items reviewed** from P1/P2/P3 backlog
- **41 FALSE POSITIVES** identified (code already has proper error handling)
- **1 item fixed** (BUG-002)
- **16 items deferred** (test coverage - requires 60h+ effort)

### Key Findings
Most flagged items already have robust error handling:
- SWR hooks return `error` state
- Fetch calls have try-catch blocks
- JSON.parse operations are wrapped in try-catch
- Dynamic imports have .catch() handlers

## Files Changed
- `client/woClient.ts` - Added JSON.parse error handling
- `docs/PENDING_MASTER.md` - Updated to v14.5 with verification results

## Verification
- [x] `pnpm typecheck` - 0 errors
- [x] `pnpm lint` - 0 errors
- [x] Pre-commit hooks pass'

tasks.command: gh pr edit 533 --title 'fix(client): BUG-002 JSON.parse error handling + P1/P2/P3 verification'

tasks.label: Commit Security Fixes
tasks.command: git add -A && git commit -m 'fix(security): XSS hardening + BUG-009 localhost fix + PENDING_MASTER v14.9' && git log --oneline -3

tasks.label: Commit Changes
tasks.command: git commit -m 'fix(security): XSS hardening + BUG-009 fix + PENDING_MASTER v14.9' -m 'Security Fixes (P0):' -m '- SEC-001: Added escapeHtml() to public/app.js for KPI rendering' -m '- SEC-002: Added escapeHtmlPrayer() to public/prayer-times.js' -m '- SEC-003: CRITICAL XSS fix in public/search.html (user input in innerHTML)' -m '' -m 'Bug Fixes:' -m '- BUG-009: Removed localhost:3000 fallback in returns-service.ts' -m '' -m 'New Utilities:' -m '- Created lib/api/parse-body.ts for safe JSON body parsing' -m '- Created tests/api/billing/ test files (52 tests)' -m '' -m 'Documentation:' -m '- Updated PENDING_MASTER.md to v14.9' -m '- DOC-001: CLOSED (single source of truth pattern is correct)' -m '- DOC-002: CLOSED (README already modernized)'

tasks.label: Final Status
tasks.command: git log --oneline -4 && echo '---' && git status -s && echo '---' && git remote -v | head -2

tasks.label: List PRs JSON
tasks.command: gh pr list --state open --limit 5 --json number,title 2>&1 | head -20

tasks.label: Count Tests
tasks.command: find tests -name '*.test.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo 'API Routes:' && find app/api -type d 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo 'Test Coverage Files:' && ls tests/ 2>/dev/null | head -20

tasks.label: API Coverage
tasks.command: echo 'Test files:' && find tests -name '*.test.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo 'API route dirs:' && find app/api -type d 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo 'Untested API routes (no corresponding test):' && for dir in app/api/billing app/api/finance app/api/hr app/api/souq; do echo "$dir: $(ls -d $dir/*/ 2>/dev/null | wc -l) subdirs"; done

tasks.label: JSON Parse Check
tasks.command: echo '=== request.json() without try-catch ===' && grep -r 'await request.json()' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep -v '.catch' | grep -v 'try' | wc -l && echo '=== Potential missing error handling ===' && grep -rn 'await request.json()' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | head -15

tasks.label: Parse Body Usage
tasks.command: echo '=== API routes with request.json() ===' && grep -rn 'await request.json()' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo '=== Using parseBody utility ===' && grep -rn 'parseBody\|parseBodyOrNull' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo '=== Using .catch() ===' && grep -rn 'request.json().catch' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l

tasks.label: Env and URL Check
tasks.command: echo '=== Env var direct access (potential issues) ===' && grep -rn 'process.env\.' lib app components services --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep -v 'process.env.NODE_ENV' | grep -v '//' | head -20 && echo '=== Hardcoded URLs ===' && grep -rn 'localhost:' app lib services --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep -v test | grep -v '.test.' | head -10

tasks.label: Code Quality Check
tasks.command: echo '=== Missing return type annotations ===' && grep -rn 'async function\|async (' app/api --include='*.ts' 2>/dev/null | grep -v ': Promise' | head -15 && echo '' && echo '=== Potential memory leaks (setInterval without cleanup) ===' && grep -rn 'setInterval' app components lib --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' 2>/dev/null | grep -v test | head -10

tasks.label: Git State
tasks.command: echo '=== Git status ===' && git status -s | head -10 && echo '' && echo '=== Current branch ===' && git branch --show-current && echo '' && echo '=== Recent commits ===' && git log --oneline -5
